trans-unit.source: Defines the configuration information used by <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingExtension"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Define as informações de configuração usadas pelo <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingExtension"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration"></xref> class using the specified <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterTable%601> and routeOnHeadersOnly parameter.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration"> </xref> classe usando especificado <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterTable%601> e routeOnHeadersOnly parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The message filter table to use for this configuration.
trans-unit.target: A tabela de filtro de mensagem a ser usado para essa configuração.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterTable%601> can only examine message headers; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterTable%601> somente pode examinar os cabeçalhos de mensagem; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether messages are to be dispatched in the order they were sent.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se as mensagens devem ser enviadas na ordem em que foram enviadas.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if messages are to be dispatched in the order they were sent; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as mensagens devem ser enviadas na ordem em que foram enviadas; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterTable%601> used by this configuration.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterTable%601> usado por esta configuração.

trans-unit.source: The message filter table.
trans-unit.target: A tabela de filtro de mensagem.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the filter can examine the message body.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o filtro pode examinar o corpo da mensagem.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the filter can only examine message headers; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o filtro só pode examinar os cabeçalhos da mensagem; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is **true**.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é **true**.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether messages should be processed between SOAP <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion>s.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se as mensagens devem ser processadas entre SOAP <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion>s.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion>

trans-unit.source: SOAP processing is the process where messages are converted between SOAP <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion>s.
trans-unit.target: Processamento de SOAP é o processo em que as mensagens são convertidas entre SOAP <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion>s.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion>

trans-unit.source: Setting this value to `false` indicates that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior> should not install the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> on the client endpoints.
trans-unit.target: Definir esse valor como `false` indica que o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior>não devem instalar o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior>nos pontos de extremidade do cliente.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior>

trans-unit.source: If set to `false`, you must add your own message inspector or other code to handle some aspects of messages before they are sent.
trans-unit.target: Se definido como `false`, você deve adicionar seu próprios Inspetor de mensagem ou outro código para lidar com alguns aspectos de mensagens antes de serem enviados.

trans-unit.source: It is also possible to disable SOAP processing on each endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Também é possível desativar o processamento em cada ponto de extremidade SOAP.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> class.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior>classe.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior> creates and attaches a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> with <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior.ProcessMessages%2A> set to `true` for each client endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior>cria e anexa um novo <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior>com <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior.ProcessMessages%2A>definido como `true` para cada ponto de extremidade do cliente.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior.ProcessMessages%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior>

trans-unit.source: If you do not want to use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> on a specific endpoint, create a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> with this value set to `false` and then attach it to the endpoint on which you do not want processing to occur.
trans-unit.target: Se você não quiser usar o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior>em um ponto de extremidade específico, crie um novo <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior>com esse valor é definido `false` e, em seguida, anexá-lo para o ponto de extremidade no qual você deseja não processamento ocorra.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior> observes that a client already has a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior>, it does not attempt to attach another.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior>observa que um cliente já tem um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior>, ele não tentará anexar outro.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior>

trans-unit.source: To disable the application of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> on any endpoint, disable SOAP processing on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior>and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration>.
trans-unit.target: Para desabilitar a aplicação de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior>qualquer ponto de extremidade, desativar o processamento de SOAP no <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior>e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior>

trans-unit.source: If SoapProcessingEnabled is `true`, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> is added to the client endpoint <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.Behaviors%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Se for SoapProcessingEnabled `true`, o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior>é adicionada para o ponto de extremidade do cliente <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.Behaviors%2A>coleção.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.Behaviors%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if messages should be processed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as mensagens devem ser processadas; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
